author: Felix Groll
description: Visual Scripting extension for the SimpleSerial package
name: io.github.jango-fx.simpleserial.visualscripting

samples.description:
Simple script, printing all incoming serial data to the console.
Configure the serial port in the `SerialConnection` asset. Add the `SimpleSerialVS` prefab to the scene. And hit Play.

Simple script, sending undulating values to serial.
Configure the serial port in the `SerialConnection` asset. Add the `SimpleSerialVS - Send` prefab to the scene. And hit Play.
Simple Arduino sketch sending a string every 500ms over the serial interface and at the same time interprets incoming values as integer (between 0 and 255) to drive an LED at pin 13 via PWM.
